general.gigTitle: do professional, responsive wordpress website design and development

sellerCard.description: Hi ! I'm a professional WordPress expert. Wordpress css modification is my passion. I can install, fix, move, customize WordPress sites.If you need help with anything WordPress & Web Development I'm your Guy!  Hope you will enjoy to work with me.

description.content:
Hi!

I am Tushar, a computer science engineer who has been designing websites for the last 7 years.


I know you want a website that's why you are on this page, so I will directly explain what benefits you will get from my service.


Visual Appeal: I create eye-catching, modern wordpress sites that reflect the fundamentals of your brand.


User-Centric Strategy: I focus on user-centric design principles to ensure that your site is easy to navigate, and delivers a smooth browsing experience.


Responsive Site: We develop sites that effortlessly adjust to different devices, guaranteeing an ideal viewing experience for your users, be it on any device.


SEO-Friendly: I developed wordpress sites that are optimized for search engines, helping your site rank in search results and attract organic traffic.


What I offer:

  • Wordpress website design and development
  • Custom site
  • Custom CSS
  • Responsive
  • Redesign
  • Animated
  • SEO friendly


Tools I use:

  • Page Builder (Divi, Elementor, BeBuilder, etc)
  • Woocommerce, ACF, CPT UI
  • Wordfance for site security
  • And more (depending on the requirement)


- Let's chat, to understand your business.


Thank you!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you install WordPress on my domain?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, i do. Just give me the credentials for the domain and hosting I will do it.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide support after sale?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do, i will give you support after completing the order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide Images?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, But if you want i can use some free images from Unsplash site.

openGraph.title: do professional, responsive wordpress website design and development

reviews.comment: Saidul is the best designer/dev I have worked with on Fiverr. He helped with a major redesign of my primary business website, and it exceeded all expectations. Saidul addressed all needed items and functionality, provided a clean, modern layout, and executed changes faster than expected. He also went above and beyond when communicating changes and made edits without errors, requiring additional edits or QC'ing to get them to work. I loved working with him and look forward to working with him on my next project.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your words, it was pleasure to work with you, I would like to work with you again.

reviews.comment: Once again, Saidul, went above and beyond to provide an excellent design experience. I recently hired him for a large redesign project. I immediately hired him again after he delivered the last order so that he could redesign the remaining pages on my site. He is a fantastic designer and knows WordPress's technical ins and outs to ensure pages and design elements function as intended. His technical knowledge and communication skills are fantastic! Keep up the amazing work you provide.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much, it was a pleasure to work with you.

reviews.comment: Saidul absolutely crushed it with my business' website and delivered exactly what I was looking for. The site looks great, has great performance, and he was really good with prompt and friendly communication. He made sure all requests and objectives were done and I'll definitely be going to him again for any further projects. Thanks Saidul!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much. It was a pleasure to work with you.

reviews.comment: Amazing job, couldn't be happier with the site he created for me. Some of the best work I've seen on Fiverr. Will certainly be back again for more help and I recommend him to others :)

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much. Love to work with you again.

reviews.comment: Saidul's work in website development was nothing short of exceptional. His professionalism and ability to exceed expectations truly impressed me. Working with him was a breeze, thanks to his deep understanding, quick delivery, and high level of cooperation . Highly recommended!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much sir. Would like to work with you again.
